definition: twelfth lunar month
12th lunar month/preserved (meat, fish etc)
moon/month/monthly/CL:個|个[ge4],輪|轮[lun2]
final days of the lunar year

sentences.english: You say, when the severe winter, will accompany me to see the flying snow.
sentences.chinese: 你說，待到寒冬臘月時，就陪我去看那場飛天雪地吧。

sentences.english: He loafed through the winter months.
She was in severe winter and spring in March.
sentences.chinese: 她在寒冬臘月奔放，又在陽春三月凋落。

sentences.english: In Japan, this special auspicious day.
sentences.chinese: 臘月日，這個特別吉祥的日子。

sentences.english: Plums blossom from the 12th lunar month to the second month of the next year.
sentences.chinese: 梅花會從農曆臘月一直開到第二年二月。

sentences.english: After six years of strict discipline, he finally realized his dream of full enlightenment on the eighth day of the twelfth lunar month.
sentences.chinese: 後經六年苦行，終於在臘月初八這一天悟道成佛。

sentences.english: It happened in a cold December.
sentences.chinese: 這事發生在一個寒冬臘月。

sentences.english: In the severe winter, the cold wind outside pricks people.
sentences.chinese: 寒冬臘月，外邊冷風襲人。

sentences.english: The 23rd day of the 12th lunar month is called Preliminary Eve .
sentences.chinese: 在農曆臘月23日人們會祭竈王爺。

sentences.english: Young people, even in deepest winter wheat also prefer iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 年輕人即使在寒冬臘月也偏愛冰鎮麥茶。

sentences.english: Calculating by heart, it's late winter, and the last month of the lunar year is coming hitchily.
sentences.chinese: 屈指算來，已是深冬，陰曆臘月的腳步在蹣跚走來。

solar calendar/Western (Gregorian) calendar
lunar calendar

11 am-1 pm (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)

temple fair
Double Ninth or Yang Festival/9th day of 9th lunar month
end of the year
birthday (of an old person)
to offer birthday congratulations (to an elderly person)
3-5 am (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)
Qingming or Pure Brightness Festival or Tomb Sweeping Day, celebration for the dead (in early April)
